Room.Name: Eidenhoft Boulevard/Lelion Way Intersection
Room.ShortDescription: You are at the intersection of Lelion Way and Eidenhoft Boulevard.
Room.LongDescription: Eidenhoft Boulevard runs south out of the intersection with Lelion Way, which runs east and west. Lelion Way runs parallel to the Lithum Bay, eventually running into the Lelion Beach and Park to the west. Eidenhoft Boulevard runs south through the major sections of the southwestern section of town.
